actions.args: {"body": {"name": "Owen Developer Relations Contributor Report. 4/1/24 - 4/14/24", "summary": "Bi-weekly paid developer relations contributor report. The aim of these activities is to onboard more developers to the ecosystem, and assist existing developers with problems or enrich their experience in the ecosystem. Activities for the last two weeks can be seen below.", "category": "Decentralized DevRel", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "bpolania.near", "description": "## Timeline\\\\nStart Date: April 1, 2024\\\\n\\\\nEnd Date: April 14, 2024\\\\n\\\\u{200b}\\\\n## Requested Funding\\\\nHours: 66:45\\\\n\\\\nRate: $50/hour \\\\n\\\\nTotal Amount: $3,337\\\\n\\\\n# Summary of Activities\\\\n\\\\n### Direct Developer Support\\\\n- 1:10 Supporting developers with questions through Discord and Telegram\\\\n\\\\n### Chain Signatures \\\\n- 3:20 Forwarded my learning and understanding of NEAR chain signatures to better support developers both remotely and at hackathons including call with Mike from Proximity \\\\n\\\\n### Events\\\\n- 12:20 ETH DAM preperation, creating two talks, setting up bounties, prep call, etc.\\\\n- 0:20 Call with hackathon contributor for ETH DAM\\\\n- 3:00 Completing expenses for Oxford + Cambridge workshops and ETH Denver and submitting reciepts to supervisors\\\\n- 34:25 Supporting ETH DAM hackathon (including travel), we had 12 eligable submissions with many to a high quality\\\\n\\\\n### Technical Communities\\\\n- 2:00 Improving Zero Knowledge Community page\\\\n- 0:50 Zero Knowledge Community Call prep\\\\n\\\\n## Content \\\\n- 2:30 Working on full stack video tutorial \\\\n- 2:30 Putting out Developer Twitter content \\\\n- 0:20 Participation in Thursday DevHub livestream\\\\n\\\\n### General / Other\\\\n- 0:10 Reviewing DevHub proposals\\\\n- 2:40 DevRel team calls + writing meeting notes\\\\n- 0:30 Helping distribute tooling survey \\\\n- 0:40 Misc activities, includes assisting DevRel team, interaction with verticals like Hackbox, channel moderation etc.", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "icespice.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "3337", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}

{"body": {"name": "Developer Relations Report 4/1-4/14", "summary": "DevHub Moderator Contributions from 4/1-4/14", "category": "DevDAO Operations", "timeline": {"status": "REVIEW", "sponsor_requested_review": false, "reviewer_completed_attestation": false}, "supervisor": "bpolania.near", "description": "**Devhub Activities (15 hours)**\\\\n\\\\n- Contributors Proposal Reviews and Approvals \\\\n- Newsletter\\\\n- Developer content planning\\\\n- Workgroup support\\\\n- Goals and outcomes document\\\\n\\\\n**DevRel (13 hours):**\\\\n\\\\n- Internal Meetings: weekly stand-ups, 1-on-1 with team members, and meetings with core team members.\\\\n- Ecosystem developer conversations and feedback collection for current and future initiatives\\\\n- Developer and community support meetings for work and proposals\\\\n- Developer follow-up\\\\n- Developer outreach\\\\n- Virtual support to hackathons\\\\n- Liaison for multiple groups and DAOs for DevRel support\\\\n- Meetings with teams like HZN and marketing\\\\n\\\\n**Marketing & Retention Planning & In-Progress (50 hours):**\\\\n\\\\n- Social content planning\\\\n- Continued design and reuse of multiple short challenges and materials\\\\n- Post hackathon planning\\\\n* Update social content\\\\n* Marketing funnel work\\\\n* Chain Abstraction video content\\\\n* Chain abstraction community setup\\\\n* Video planning and scripting\\\\n* Video recordings\\\\n* Live planning, setup, and recording\\\\n* Partnership planning and meetings\\\\n\\\\n**Reimbursements:**\\\\nTwitter Ads:  $50\\\\nStreamyard: $50\\\\n\\\\n**Timeline**\\\\n\\\\n- Start Date: 4/1/2024\\\\n- End Date: 4/14/2024\\\\n\\\\n**Requested Funding**\\\\n\\\\n- Total hours: 78\\\\n- Rate: $100/hour\\\\n- Total amount: $7900 USDC", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "orangejoe.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "7900", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}

{"data": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"image\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"ipfs_cid\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"bafkreicwufss6d4ypafaun3gwd7kbqrtf67exc6w5zqrrfuhj5kcy4zcau\\\\\\\"},\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"# \\\\u{1f680} [near-jsonrpc-client-rs](https://github.com/near/near-jsonrpc-client-rs) has a new release [0.9.0](https://github.com/near/near-jsonrpc-client-rs/releases/tag/v0.9.0)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nIt is a breaking change since nearcore dependencies were upgraded to version 0.21.x which reflects the latest NEAR RPC interfaces and introduces a highly flexible interface to submit transactions. Learn more about RPC changes [here](https://github.com/near/nearcore/blob/447572bb775a5954ca7a5a4b65c85b45aab9e499/chain/jsonrpc/CHANGELOG.md#023)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}, "handle": "tooling"}

{"data": {"tooling.community.devhub.near": {"post": {"main": "{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"image\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"ipfs_cid\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"bafkreicwufss6d4ypafaun3gwd7kbqrtf67exc6w5zqrrfuhj5kcy4zcau\\\\\\\"},\\\\\\\"text\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"# \\\\u{1f680} [near-jsonrpc-client-rs](https://github.com/near/near-jsonrpc-client-rs) has a new release [0.9.0](https://github.com/near/near-jsonrpc-client-rs/releases/tag/v0.9.0)\\\\\\\\n\\\\\\\\nIt is a breaking change since nearcore dependencies were upgraded to version 0.21.x which reflects the latest NEAR RPC interfaces and introduces a highly flexible interface to submit transactions. Learn more about RPC changes [here](https://github.com/near/nearcore/blob/447572bb775a5954ca7a5a4b65c85b45aab9e499/chain/jsonrpc/CHANGELOG.md#023)\\\\\\\"}"}, "index": {"post": "{\\\\\\\"key\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"main\\\\\\\",\\\\\\\"value\\\\\\\":{\\\\\\\"type\\\\\\\":\\\\\\\"md\\\\\\\"}}"}}}}

{"id": 40, "body": {"name": "Devrel Activities by Boris Polania (April 08 - April 19)", "summary": "This is the summary of my activities for the specified period ", "category": "DevDAO Operations", "timeline": {"status": "DRAFT"}, "supervisor": "theori.near", "description": "This is the summary of my activities for the specified period\\\\n\\\\n## Planned Activities\\\\nThe following activities will be completed from April 08 - April 19. \\\\n\\\\n### Devhub Activities (32 hours)\\\\n* Contributors Proposal Reviews and Approvals (5 hours)\\\\n* Projects Proposal Reviews (4 hours)\\\\n* Devhub Internal Meetings (7 hours)\\\\n* Devrels 2024 Proposal (16 hours)\\\\n### DevRel Activities (30 hours) \\\\n* Internal Meetings: weekly standup, 1-on-1 meetings with contributors. (2 hours)\\\\n* Content: Articles, Sample Code, etc. (20 hours)\\\\n* General Support in telegram, discord, etc. (8 hours)\\\\n### Events (16 hours)\\\\n* Q1 Post Event - Social Networks, prizes, meetings, etc.  (3 hours)\\\\n* Events Committee - Hackathon Manual, budget proposal review (8 hours)\\\\n* Bounty Booster Rules, Manual, Form (5)\\\\n### NEAR Campus (2 hours)\\\\n* Phasing-out meetings and final proposal closing (2 hours)\\\\n### Timeline\\\\n* Start Date: 04/08/2024\\\\n* End Date: 04/19/2024\\\\n### Requested Funding\\\\n* Total hours: 80 hours\\\\n* Rate: $100/hour\\\\n* Total amount: $8,000 USD\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n\\\\n", "linked_proposals": [], "receiver_account": "bpolania.near", "requested_sponsor": "neardevdao.near", "proposal_body_version": "V0", "requested_sponsorship_usd_amount": "8000", "requested_sponsorship_paid_in_currency": "USDC"}, "labels": []}
